fr.sorbonne_u.components.plugins.helpers

Class AbstractClientSidePlugin

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.sorbonne_u.components.AbstractPlugin
      • fr.sorbonne_u.components.plugins.helpers.AbstractClientSidePlugin
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    PluginI, ClientSidePluginI, java.io.Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    DataInterfacePushControlClientSidePlugin

    public abstract class AbstractClientSidePlugin
extends AbstractPlugin
implements ClientSidePluginI
    The class AbstractClientSidePlugin provides the functionalities required to connect a client component to a server component for given required and offered interfaces.

    Description

    See ClientSidePluginI.

    Invariant

     invariant              true

    Created on : 2019-03-06

    Author:
    Jacques Malenfant
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean connectWithServerSide(java.lang.String serverReflectionInboundPortURI)
      connect the outbound port to the server of the given reflection inbound port URI.
      protected abstract OutboundPortI createOutboundPort()
      return the outbound port instance that must be used to connect with the server side.
      void disconnectFromServerSide()
      disconnect the outbound port from the server-side.
      void finalise()
      disconnect the outbound port if not yet disconnected, unpublish it and destroy it.
      protected abstract java.lang.String getConnectorClassName()
      return the name of the connector class to be used to connect with the server side.
      protected abstract java.lang.Class<?> getOfferedInterface()
      return the interface required by the client-side.
      AbstractOutboundPort getOutboundPort()
      return the outbound port managed by this plug-in or null if it has not been created yet; should be overridden with the precise return type of the actual outbound port required interface to ease the calling of this interface methods.
      protected abstract java.lang.Class<?> getRequiredInterface()
      return the interface required by the client side.
      void initialise()
      add the port returned by @see{createOutboundPort()} to the ports of the owner component and publish it.
      void installOn(ComponentI owner)
      add the interface returned by @see{getRequiredInterface()} to the required interfaces of the owner component.
      boolean isConnectedToServerSide()
      true if the plug-in is connected to a server side plug-in.
      void uninstall()
      remove the required interface from the required interfaces of the owner component.

        public boolean connectWithServerSide(java.lang.String serverReflectionInboundPortURI)
                              throws java.lang.Exception
        Description copied from interface: ClientSidePluginI
        connect the outbound port to the server of the given reflection inbound port URI.

        Contract

         pre    serverReflectionInboundPortURI != null
 post   !ret || this.isConnectedToServerSide()
        Specified by:
        connectWithServerSide in interface ClientSidePluginI
        Parameters:
        serverReflectionInboundPortURI - URI of the reflection inbound port of the server component.
        Returns:
        true if the connection was made successfully.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - if the server-side component does not have an inbound port of the needed offered interface.
        See Also:
